attributes.action: acknowledge Saint George's Day as a National Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As an english nation we should be allowed a national day to celebrate our nationality and culture.

As a country, we celebrate, "Paddy's Day" more than we do "Saint George's Day"

We must acknowlege and respect our own history and culture, while as well as respecting the religons and cultures of other nations.

We live in a multicultrial society, while we accept and respect other peoples relegions we also have a duty not to forget or ignore English Traditions.  This is also a day to celebrate the best of the past, current and future of the country.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
